g.text: Issues: Cramped 30px rows, small 16px buttons, weak hierarchy
✅ Improvements: 45px rows, 24px buttons, status bars, visual separators
Last used: 2 hours ago • Created: March 15
✅ Features: Search, usage stats, timestamps, copy functionality
✅ Organization: Collapsible groups, view modes, sorting
✅ Grid benefits: Fast scanning, efficient space use, usage indicators
• Increase row height from 30px to 45px minimum
• Add 3px status indicators on left edge
• Improve button positioning and visual weight
• Grouped organization when library grows (>20 shortcuts)
• Grid view for power users with many shortcuts
Recommendation: Start with Phase 1 for immediate UX improvements
• Visual hierarchy: Weak → Strong (status bars, dividers)
• Concept 1: Low effort, high impact (CSS + spacing changes)
• Concept 2: Medium effort (new data fields + UI components)
• Concept 3: High effort (grouping logic + collapsible UI)
• Concept 4: Medium effort (grid layout + responsive design)
